DOC.HEADLINE: WEEKEND TV ; GAMES BEGIN , REINDEER AND ALL , ON CBS
DOC.TEXT: The much anticipated Olympic Winter Games begin tonight on CBS , from Lillehammer , Norway , with the opening ceremony , downhill skiing practice and ice_hockey highlighting the festivities.Dancers , singers , fiddlers and reindeer perform in a tribute to Lapp and Norwegian folk culture , 8 p.m. , Channels 2 and 8 . On Sunday , CBS offers all-day coverage beginning at 11 a.m. and continues it through prime_time with alpine skiing ( men ' s downhill ) , figure_skating , ice_hockey ( United States vs . France ) , speedskating , luge and cross-country_skiing . Discussions on several of the weekend ' s public_service programs will center around possible NATO-sponsored air strikes in Bosnia and the fate of President Clinton ' s health-care plan .
